text: Already 10 yrs old? I can't believe that. I've always been a Nintendo fan, TLoZ being my favorite franchise, but my favorite game might very well be this one. Funny thing is, I got the game as a bonus with my Gamecube and was (at first) disappointed in not getting a game I was more interested in. What a surprise I got when I actually got to playing this masterpiece.

text: You can definitely give credit to Retro Studios for making just a great game.
author: Kenneth Rogers

text: I love how special Metroid Prime's soundtrack feels. It stands out from the others and seems to provoke nostalgia very well, and WILL get stuck in your head at least once. At one moment you'll be on the edge of your seat, hoping nothing's around that next corner, and the next moment you're being comforted by waves of nostalgia, then getting pumped up for a boss battle. It's something that is so rare, yet so beautiful. I just wish there were more games with astounding soundtracks like this.
author: Scooblee

text: Good track...reminds me of Chrono Chross.

text:
Twilight Princess is one of the best games I have ever played. I also played the gamecube version first before getting a Wii so I understand and can see your point of view. 
Personally I just enjoyed Prime the most, I think it was a matter of timing for me. Twilight Princess was 3 years later and I had just gotten married and was in school full time and only experienced it in chunks of about one hour a day. Prime I was able to spend a whole weekend with uninterrupted in the middle of the day.

text: After a few years of the Wii gathering dust, I decided to play this game again on the Trilogy version over the weekend.  The graphics still looked modern.  I can say the same thing with other Gamecube games like Super Mario Sunshine.  With that art style, you don't need $200 graphics cards that become outdated after six months.  It just looks brilliant.

author: duto009

text:
Super Metroid is one of my favourite games of all time. When Metroid Prime came out I bought it, but I was somehow very disappointed. I came a bit into Chozo Ruins before I finally decided I couldn't keep playing the game. About 8 years later, I wanted to try the game again, I don't know why.

Deciding to try the game again was a very good decision. For this time I loved it. I can't believe I had missed out on such a great game. I can't believe I didn't like it back then.

Very good game.

text:
Nintendo always has a studio for legendary series.
HAL - Kirby & Smash bros.
Game Freak - Pokemon
Nintendo - Mario & Zelda(duh)
Rare - Donkey Kong(R.I.P Rare Nintendo brotherhood)
And Retro Studios with Metroid. Not to say others have done poor or anything with any of these franchises, but these companies really went above and beyond with their respective franchises
